reviewText: Dad wanted to see the animals in their truest forms, with no holding back.  This DVD is exactly as they would show on Nat Geo Wild, with all the violence the animals would normally display in the wild.  Great educational DVD for the family.  If you are a parent who is concerned about your child watching the reality of the wild, this isn't for you, but if you want them to truely learn about the nature of these beasts, then this is it.
Excellent. Thank you very much for your prompt delivery.
